data.title: Billy Two Hats - Wikipedia
data.meta_description: Billy Two Hats - Wikipedia - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Billy Two Hats is a 1974 Western film directed by Ted Kotcheff, starring Gregory Peck as outlaw Arch Deans and Desi Arnaz, Jr. as Billy Two Hats, a Scottish outlaw's young Indian half-breed friend. After a bank robbery goes wrong, Billy is captured while Deans escapes. They later reunite and encounter a remote homestead, whose young mail-order bride Esther develops feelings for Billy. Complications arise from an abusive husband and pursuing lawman Sheriff Henry Gifford. The film is based on a script by Alan Sharp and was filmed on location in Israel.
